editor.keep_keypad_visible: Keep the keypad always visible, also when no code input is required.
editor.button_scale_actions: Scaling factor to apply for resizing the action buttons.
editor.button_scale_keypad: Scaling factor to apply for resizing the keypad buttons.
editor.use_clear_icon: Show icon (instead of text) in keypad for clearing code input.
editor.show_messages: Display diagnostic messages when alarm is triggered or cannot be armed.
editor.show_ready_indicator: Show ready/not ready indicator on arm mode buttons.
editor.show_bypassed_sensors: Show warning message when alarm is armed with bypassed sensors.
editor.use_arm_button_icons: Use icons on action buttons (instead of labels)

errors.blocking_sensors: Could not arm due to the following sensors
errors.triggered_sensors: Alarm was triggered by the following sensors
